features: Dual spindrift closure allows the pack to expand or collapse, depending on the load
Internal hanging pocket keeps essentials organized and easily accessible
Adjustable ice-axe carry can handle most axe shapes
Modular, removable compression straps provide maximum gear-carrying versatility
Removable framesheet and hip-belt pads make the pack even lighter for the final summit bid
Three-point, over-the-top rope-carrying system can be removed to further streamline the load
